scripts.text: You are Justin the Beaver, standing at the edge of your family lodge. The wilderness stretches out before you, filled with opportunities and dangers. What will you do?
As you venture into the forest, you hear rustling in the bushes. It's Acornelius the Squirrel! He seems excited to see you.
You start collecting sticks and mud to build your dam.
Acornelius shares some tips about finding the best materials for your dam. He offers to help you gather some.
Acornelius helps you gather materials for your dam. Together, you collect a large pile of sticks and mud. You gain 1 stick!

choices.text: Thank Acornelius and start building the dam.

scripts.text: You venture deeper into the forest, where the trees grow taller and the sounds of wildlife surround you. You feel a sense of adventure.
You find a tall tree and decide to climb it for a better view of the forest. As you reach the top, you spot a glimmering object in the distance.

choices.text: Climb down and investigate the object.
Stay in the tree and enjoy the view.

scripts.text: You climb down and head towards the glimmering object. It's a shiny golden key! You pick it up.
You take a moment to enjoy the beautiful view of the forest. It's peaceful and serene.

choices.text: Climb down and continue your adventure.

scripts.text: You successfully gather materials and start building your dam. However, you need 3 sticks to complete the structure.

choices.text: Use the sticks to complete the dam.

scripts.text: Congratulations! You have completed your dam and created a thriving lodge for your beaver family. You win!
You find a sunny clearing with scattered sticks on the ground. A mysterious riddle awaits you.
You collect some sticks. They will be useful for building your dam.

choices.text: Go back to the previous location.

scripts.text: You are on a rocky mountain path. The air is crisp and cold.
You reach the mountain peak and find a pile of sticks left by a bird.

choices.text: Descend back to the mountain path.
